text:
Itzhak Ilan or Yitzhak Ilan (July 28, 1956 – October 16, 2020) was a Georgian-born Israeli security official. He worked for the Israel Security Agency. From 2010 to 2011, he was Deputy Director of the Shin Bet. Ilan was born in Surami, Georgia.
Ilan died of COVID-19 on October 16, 2020 in Tel Aviv at the age of 64.
